pkgmetadata.longdescription: Logic Regression // Routines for fitting Logic Regression models. Logic Regression is described in Ruczinski, Kooperberg, and LeBlanc (2003) DOI:10.1198/1061860032238. Monte Carlo Logic Regression is described in and Kooperberg and Ruczinski (2005) DOI:10.1002/gepi.20042.
